text: Tabitha St. Germain, formerly known as Paulina Gillis Germain, Tabitha, or Kitanou St. Germain, is an American, Canadian Actress, Singer, Voice actress, and Comedienne. She is known for her voice roles in many TV shows, but most of all is My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic for Rarity, Princess Luna, Granny Smith, and Derpy Hooves. She voices Wysteria and Minty from My Little Pony. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Canadian comedians Category:Actors from Vancouver Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian singers Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Vancouver Category:Actors from Boston
title: Tabitha St. Germain
